thread.section_title: Jimmyjane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jimmyjane | jimmyjane.com
thread.title: Seriously Satisfied Customer ;)
thread.title_full: Jimmyjane reviewed by Seriously Satisfied Customer ;)

author: Seriously Satisfied Customer ;)
title: Seriously Satisfied Customer ;)
text:
My only issue with the exchange was the shipping speed. It took a week for the product to get here. Sure, there are other, really expensive options, but I ordered condoms. Who wants to pay more than the actual product in shipping?
But still, 5 stars all the way for Jimmyjane. I received updates, they checked in to make sure I was satisfied (with the product of course *cough*) the package arrived discretely with no damage and wrapped appropriately. No complaints - just wish there were cheaper and faster shipping options, but that doesn't detract from the overall experience for me.
